Bash(git -C /home/fsd42/dev/me commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix blog E2E test to handle posts without categories

The categories element is conditionally rendered in BlogPostCard when
post.categories is non-empty. The test was unconditionally asserting
visibility, causing CI failures when the first Dev.to post had no
categories.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
